name: Lucid - A Game About Dreams
description:
Lucid is the story of an unlikely hero – Leif; a 50 year old accountant from Måsnes, a small distant fishing village in the northernmost part of Norway. Still living in his parents’ old house, he is a boring, lonely, and depressed old man.

One beautiful summer night he wakes up to a brilliant midnight sun, and for the first time in years he can remember his dreams. He begins to wonder; is there a connection between his dreams and the real world?

With help from an old friend he explores the spiritualism of the native Sami people and discovers his own lost connection to the indigenous community. Learning from the Noaidi he embarks on a journey into his own subconscious. Perhaps the change he needs starts from within?

Classic Point & Click gameplay

From experienced gamers to curious beginners - The Point & Click Adventure is a time honored genre that is both accessible and engaging.

A passion for storytelling and authenticity

The story of Lucid - A Game About Dreams - was produced in collaboration with expert scriptwriters, psychologists and academics.

Beyond the Arctic Circle

In the small town of Måsnes you get to meet the stout nordic people who live in the harsh but beautiful North, and get a close look at the culture of the indigenous Sami and their traditions.

Stunning Environments

The raw beauty of the majestic Norwegian nature is brought to life by a team of experienced artists from award winning games such as Firewatch, The Longest Journey, Age of Conan, and Trolls vs. Vikings. As well as young and up and coming talent.
